zero_comp:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `zero_at_infty_continuous_map -/
@[simp]
theorem zero_comp (g : «expr →co » β γ) : (0 : zero_at_infty_continuous_map γ δ).comp g = 0 :=
  rfl
#align zero_comp zero_comp
zero_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `zero_at_infty_continuous_map -/
theorem zero_apply [Zero β] : (0 : zero_at_infty_continuous_map α β) x = 0 :=
  rfl
#align zero_apply zero_apply
uniform_continuous:
theorem uniform_continuous (f : F) : uniform_continuous (f : β → γ) :=
  (map_continuous f).uniform_continuous_of_zero_at_infty (zero_at_infty f)
#align uniform_continuous uniform_continuous
to_bcf_injective:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `zero_at_infty_continuous_map -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `bounded_continuous_function -/
theorem to_bcf_injective :
    function.injective (to_bcf : zero_at_infty_continuous_map α β → bounded_continuous_function α β) := fun f g h =>
  by
  ext
  simpa only using fun_like.congr_fun h x
#align to_bcf_injective to_bcf_injective
tendsto_iff_tendsto_uniformly:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `zero_at_infty_continuous_map -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `zero_at_infty_continuous_map -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/-- Convergence in the metric on `C₀(α, β)` is uniform convergence. -/
theorem tendsto_iff_tendsto_uniformly {ι : Type _} {F : ι → zero_at_infty_continuous_map α β}
    {f : zero_at_infty_continuous_map α β} {l : filter ι} :
    tendsto F l ((nhds) f) ↔ tendsto_uniformly (fun i => F i) f l := by
  simpa only [metric.tendsto_nhds] using
    @bounded_continuous_function.tendsto_iff_tendsto_uniformly _ _ _ _ _ (fun i => (F i).to_bcf) f.to_bcf l
#align tendsto_iff_tendsto_uniformly tendsto_iff_tendsto_uniformly
sub_apply:
theorem sub_apply : (f - g) x = f x - g x :=
  rfl
#align sub_apply sub_apply
star_apply:

theorem star_apply (f : zero_at_infty_continuous_map α β) (x : α) : (star f) x = star (f x) :=
  rfl
#align star_apply star_apply

    (f : zero_at_infty_continuous_map α β) (x : α) : («expr • » r f) x = «expr • » r (f x) :=
  rfl
#align smul_apply smul_apply

ext:

#align ext ext

dist_to_bcf_eq_dist:

#align copy_eq copy_eq
comp_id:

  | int.of_nat n => by rw [zsmul_rec, Int.ofNat_eq_coe, coe_nsmul_rec, coe_nat_zsmul]

closed_range_to_bcf:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `zero_at_infty_continuous_map -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `bounded_continuous_function -/
theorem closed_range_to_bcf :
    is_closed (range (to_bcf : zero_at_infty_continuous_map α β → bounded_continuous_function α β)) :=
  by
  refine' is_closed_iff_cluster_pt.mpr fun f hf => _
  rw [cluster_pt_principal_iff] at hf
  have : tendsto f (cocompact α) ((nhds) 0) :=
    by
    refine' metric.tendsto_nhds.mpr fun ε hε => _
    obtain ⟨_, hg, g, rfl⟩ := hf (ball f (ε / 2)) (ball_mem_nhds f <| half_pos hε)
    refine' (metric.tendsto_nhds.mp (zero_at_infty g) (ε / 2) (half_pos hε)).mp (eventually_of_forall fun x hx => _)
    calc
      dist (f x) 0 ≤ dist (g.to_bcf x) (f x) + dist (g x) 0 := dist_triangle_left _ _ _
      _ < dist g.to_bcf f + ε / 2 := add_lt_add_of_le_of_lt (dist_coe_le_dist x) hx
      _ < ε := by simpa [add_halves ε] using add_lt_add_right hg (ε / 2)
      
  exact
    ⟨⟨f.to_continuous_map, this⟩, by
      ext
      rfl⟩
#align closed_range_to_bcf closed_range_to_bcf
bounded_range:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `zero_at_infty_continuous_map -/
theorem bounded_range (f : zero_at_infty_continuous_map α β) : bounded (range f) :=
  bounded_range_iff.2 f.bounded
#align bounded_range bounded_range
bounded_image:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `zero_at_infty_continuous_map -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
theorem bounded_image (f : zero_at_infty_continuous_map α β) (s : set α) : bounded («expr '' » f s) :=
  f.bounded_range.mono <| image_subset_range _ _
#align bounded_image bounded_image
bounded:
protected theorem bounded (f : F) : ∃ C, ∀ x y : α, dist ((f : α → β) x) (f y) ≤ C :=
  by
  obtain ⟨K : set α, hK₁, hK₂⟩ :=
    mem_cocompact.mp (tendsto_def.mp (zero_at_infty (f : F)) _ (closed_ball_mem_nhds (0 : β) zero_lt_one))
  obtain ⟨C, hC⟩ := (hK₁.image (map_continuous f)).bounded.subset_ball (0 : β)
  refine' ⟨max C 1 + max C 1, fun x y => _⟩
  have : ∀ x, f x ∈ closed_ball (0 : β) (max C 1) := by
    intro x
    by_cases hx : x ∈ K
    · exact (mem_closed_ball.mp <| hC ⟨x, hx, rfl⟩).trans (le_max_left _ _)
    · exact (mem_closed_ball.mp <| mem_preimage.mp (hK₂ hx)).trans (le_max_right _ _)
  exact (dist_triangle (f x) 0 (f y)).trans (add_le_add (mem_closed_ball.mp <| this x) (mem_closed_ball'.mp <| this y))
#align bounded bounded
add_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `zero_at_infty_continuous_map -/
theorem add_apply [add_zero_class β] [has_continuous_add β] (f g : zero_at_infty_continuous_map α β) :
    (f + g) x = f x + g x :=
  rfl
#align add_apply add_apply
